file.name: KSeF-batch.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: KSeF
  description: Krajowy System e-Faktur
  contact:
    name: Info
    url: https://ksef.mf.gov.pl
    email: info.ksef@mf.gov.pl
  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  description: Dokumentacja
  url: https://www.gov.pl/web/kas/krajowy-system-e-faktur
servers:
- url: https://ksef.mf.gov.pl/api
  description: Środowisko produkcyjne
  variables: {}
- url: https://ksef-demo.mf.gov.pl/api
  description: Środowisko demonstracyjne
  variables: {}
- url: https://ksef-test.mf.gov.pl/api
  description: Środowisko testowe
  variables: {}
tags:
- name: KSeF
  description: Krajowy System e-Faktur
  externalDocs:
    description: Krajowy System e-Faktur
    url: https://ksef.mf.gov.pl
paths:
  /batch/Finish:
    post:
      tags:
      - Wysyłka wsadowa
      summary: Wysyłka wsadowa paczki faktur do KSeF - finalizacja
      description: Finalizacja wysyłki wsadowej paczki faktur
      operationId: finish
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/FinishRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Finalizacja wysyłki wsadowej paczki faktur poprawna
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/FinishResponse'
        "400":
          description: Nieprawidłowe wywołanie
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'
  /batch/Init:
    post:
      tags:
      - Wysyłka wsadowa
      summary: Wysyłka wsadowa paczki faktur do KSeF - inicjalizacja
      description: Inicjalizacja wysyłki wsadowej paczki faktur. Podpisany dokument
        http://ksef.mf.gov.pl/schema/gtw/svc/batch/init/request/2021/10/01/0001/InitRequest
      operationId: initRequest
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/octet-stream:
            schema:
              type: string
              format: binary
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Inicjalizacja wysyłki wsadowej paczki faktur poprawna
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitResponse'
        "400":
          description: Nieprawidłowe wywołanie
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'
  /batch/Upload/{ReferenceNumber}/{PartName}:
    put:
      tags:
      - Wysyłka wsadowa
      summary: Wysyłka wsadowa paczki faktur do KSeF - załadowanie części paczki
      description: Załadowanie zaszyfrowanych części paczki
      operationId: upload
      parameters:
      - name: ReferenceNumber
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: PartName
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Zaszyfrowana część paczki kluczem symetrycznym zadeklarowanym
          w dokumencie Init
        content:
          application/octet-stream:
            schema:
              type: string
              format: binary
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Załadowanie części paczki poprawne
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UploadResponse'
        "400":
          description: Nieprawidłowe wywołanie
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    FinishResponse:
      required:
      - referenceNumber
      - timestamp
      type: object
      properties:
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        referenceNumber:
          pattern: "(20[2-9][0-9]|2[1-9][0-9]{2}|[3-9][0-9]{3})(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(0[1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-1])-([0-9A-Z]{2})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{2})"
          type: string
    ExceptionDetailType:
      required:
      - exceptionCode
      - exceptionDescription
      type: object
      properties:
        exceptionCode:
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
          format: int32
        exceptionDescription:
          maxLength: 256
          minLength: 1
          type: string
    ExceptionResponse:
      required:
      - exception
      type: object
      properties:
        exception:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionType'
    ExceptionType:
      required:
      - exceptionDetailList
      - serviceCode
      - serviceCtx
      - serviceName
      - timestamp
      type: object
      properties:
        serviceCtx:
          maxLength: 64
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        serviceCode:
          maxLength: 64
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        serviceName:
          maxLength: 64
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        referenceNumber:
          pattern: "(20[2-9][0-9]|2[1-9][0-9]{2}|[3-9][0-9]{3})(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(0[1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-1])-([0-9A-Z]{2})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{2})"
          type: string
        exceptionDetailList:
          maxItems: 100
          minItems: 1
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionDetailType'
    FinishRequest:
      required:
      - referenceNumber
      - timestamp
      type: object
      properties:
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        referenceNumber:
          pattern: "(20[2-9][0-9]|2[1-9][0-9]{2}|[3-9][0-9]{3})(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(0[1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-1])-([0-9A-Z]{2})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{2})"
          type: string
    HeaderEntryType:
      required:
      - key
      - value
      type: object
      properties:
        key:
          maxLength: 64
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        value:
          maxLength: 128
          minLength: 1
          type: string
    InitResponse:
      required:
      - packageSignature
      - referenceNumber
      - timestamp
      type: object
      properties:
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        referenceNumber:
          pattern: "(20[2-9][0-9]|2[1-9][0-9]{2}|[3-9][0-9]{3})(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(0[1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-1])-([0-9A-Z]{2})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{2})"
          type: string
        packageSignature:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PackageSignatureInitResponseType'
    PackagePartSignatureInitResponseType:
      required:
      - method
      - ordinalNumber
      - partFileName
      - url
      type: object
      properties:
        ordinalNumber:
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
          format: int32
        partFileName:
          pattern: "[a-zA-Z0-9_\\.\\-]{5,100}"
          type: string
        url:
          maxLength: 512
          minLength: 1
          pattern: "http[s]?:/{2}(([0-9a-z])([0-9a-z_-])*\\.)+([0-9a-z])([0-9a-z_-])*"
          type: string
        method:
          type: string
          enum:
          - POST
          - PUT
        headerEntryList:
          maxItems: 100
          minItems: 1
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HeaderEntryType'
    PackageSignatureInitResponseType:
      required:
      - packageName
      - packagePartSignatureList
      type: object
      properties:
        packageName:
          pattern: "[a-zA-Z0-9_\\.\\-]{5,100}"
          type: string
        packagePartSignatureList:
          maxItems: 100
          minItems: 1
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PackagePartSignatureInitResponseType'
    UploadResponse:
      required:
      - referenceNumber
      - timestamp
      type: object
      properties:
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        referenceNumber:
          pattern: "(20[2-9][0-9]|2[1-9][0-9]{2}|[3-9][0-9]{3})(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(0[1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-1])-([0-9A-Z]{2})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{10})-([0-9A-F]{2})"
          type: string
